pages.title: Infrastructure
pages.text: Design safe enclosures, pathways, and observation stations. The visitor experience is key to success.

pages.title: Species Diversity
pages.text: Strategically mix herbivorous and carnivorous species to maintain balance and attractiveness.

pages.title: Security Protocols
pages.text: Larger or more aggressive creatures require electric fences and containment protocols.

pages.title: Personnel Management
pages.text: Assign tasks to scientists, guards, and caretakers to keep your park operational and safe.
